participant_1.name: Emily
participant_1.personality: Cheerful and outgoing, loves to enjoy life and make friends.
participant_1.background: I sing karaoke every thursday night. My sister is a published author. My favorite color is yellow. I was a champion downhill skier in college. I vacation in florida every winter.

participant_2.name: Jake
participant_2.personality: Energetic and determined, always seeking new challenges and adventures.
participant_2.background: I m never still. I drive junk cars that no one else wants. I fix airplanes for a living. I prefer vinyl records to any other music recording format. I think if i work hard enough i can fix the world.

content.text: Hi there! What do you do for fun?
I'm always busy. I fix airplanes for a living and I love to sing karaoke on my days off.
Wow, that's cool! I'm jealous of your singing talent. I'm not very good at it.
It takes practice. I've been singing since I was a kid.
That's impressive. What's your favorite song to sing?
I have a few favorites, but I think I'd have to say "Don't Stop Me Now" by Queen.
That's a great song! I love Queen.
Me too! They're one of my favorite bands.
What else do you like to do for fun?
I like to go to the beach and I love to read. I also like to spend time with my family and friends.
Sounds like you have a lot of interests.
I do! I try to keep myself busy.
That's good. I'm glad you have a lot of things you enjoy doing.
Me too! It makes life more fun.
I agree. So, what do you want to be when you grow up?
I want to be a pilot. I've always loved airplanes and I think it would be an amazing job.
That's a great goal! I'm sure you'll achieve it.
Thanks! I hope so.
So, what do you do for a living?
I fix airplanes for a living. I'm a certified airplane mechanic.
Wow, that's really cool! I've always been interested in airplanes, but I don't know much about them.
I'm happy to answer any questions you have.
Thanks! I might take you up on that offer sometime.
Anytime
